Card Ability: Return your Discard Pile and this @actioncard to your hand. This card can not be used in any way which would have you lose possesion of it.
Gain 1 @coin
If you had @coin Stolen from you this Round, Gain the same amount.

Flavour Text: protecting the city of rondelon was a tough job but at least they got free drinks out of it
sworn to protect, trained to fight, sir percwyn was conpletely unprepared for how useless his comrades would be.

Attack Ability: Has 0 @power if 2 or more @orcicon are in the Battle

Flavour Text: speed is key said sir lefly as his comrade was crushed by the giant.

Card Ability: Return to hand all @knighticon in your Discard Pile. \n @move : 1 + 1 per @knighticon in your Discard Pile.
Copy the Effect of a @actioncard the player to your Left/Right played this Round.
Copy the Effect of a card in your Discard Pile.
Swap the locations of 2 @rondeltile, keeping players on the same Tile.
Copy the Effect of a @wizardicon in your Discard Pile. \n @move : The same amount as a @wizardicon in your Discard Pile. If none, @move 1.
@last : You may Steal 2 @coin from any Player.
@last : You may Steal 2 @coin from a Player who is on your @rondeltile.
@last : You may Steal 2 @coin from any Player. Give 1 @coin to another Player.

Attack Ability: Has 0 @power if 2 or more @orcicon are in the Battle

Card Ability: @last : You may Steal 1 @coin from 3 different Players.
Attack Ability: @power equal to the Biggest @power in the Battle

Card Ability: Pay 5 @coin : Look at any player's Role Card then remove this Werewolf @actioncard from the game
If there are 0 @actioncard on a Quest, send this Assassin on the Quest face up.
Gain 3 @coin.
@last : Steal 1 @coin from any Player.
@last : Remove this Copycat @actioncard from the game. Steal 1 @actioncard in play and add it to your Discard Pile.
Attack Ability: @power equal to the Smallest @power in the Battle

Card Ability: Look at a random @actioncard on the Quest if at least 3 @actioncard are on it.
Choose a @rondeltile up to 3 ahead of your current position. Take that @rondeltile Effect instead.
Draw 5 @actioncard. Return 3 to the top and 2 to the bottom in any order.
Draw 2 @actioncard, Keep 1, Return 1 to the top.
Attack Ability: All players hide a number of their @coin in a hand,  and reveal. 1 @power per 4 @coin revealed. Pay all revealed @coin

Card Ability: Discard up to 3 @Actioncard (Before Moving). \n @move : 1 per @actioncard in hand
Return to hand a @actioncard from your Discard Pile. \n @move : 1 per @actioncard in hand
